title: Blaster's Universe (Complete 13 episodes; English with Russian v
description:
Starring Max Blaster, G.C., and MEL. Based on the Math Blaster CD-ROM games, produced by Nelvana, and aired on CBS for 13 episodes in 1999. Here's the premise:

"BlasterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Universe is an action adventure series that takes learning to the limits of the universe and back! Set in the year 2222, Blaster's Universe chronicles the adventures of Blaster, a bright, impetuous 12 year old boy obsessed with science and space, and his best friend G.C., a cool 12 year old girl who looks like an earthling but is really an alien. Based on the popular series of educational CDs, Blaster and G.C. must secretly work to save G.C.'s universe, using logic and creativity to outsmart the intergalactic outlaws."

These episodes still have the original English-language dialogue, but it's been lowered down and Russian voiceovers were heard over it (though if you listen closely, you can still hear the English dialogue). This is because they were all downloaded from a Russian video streaming website called now.ru before I got them. Hopefully someone (especially from Canada) would get all the episodes in just pure English someday.

Anyway, despite that, I hope you enjoy this series, especially if you've played the games as a kid.


List of episodes:

EP1 - You're History
EP2 - A Bridge Too Weak
EP3 - Misplaced Weekend
EP4 - A Spot of Trouble
EP5 - Uncool Copycat
EP6 - Mind Over Manners
EP7 - Body Electric
EP8 - Hero Today, Gone Tomorrow
EP9 - Sound Advice
EP10 - Math Schmath
EP11 - Nowhere to Hide
EP12 - Gym Nausium
EP13 - Buggin' Out
